languages.text: "Пускай молитвы наши увенчаны разными именами Его, но все помыслы и все стремления направлены к единому средоточию всего, что свято и чтимо. Я — слуга Бога-Императора, что вы зовете Омниссией, и некогда — служитель{mf||ница} Адептус Министорум, и в том в одном с тобой братстве".

"Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."
languages.original_text: "Пускай молитвы наши увенчаны разными именами Его, но все помыслы и все стремления направлены к единому средоточию всего, что свято и чтимо. Я — слуга Бога-Императора, что вы зовете Омниссией, и некогда — служитель{mf||ница} Адептус Министорум, и в том в одном с тобой братстве".

"Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

languages.text: "Seine Namen, die unsere Gebete krönen, mögen verschieden sein, doch all unsere Gedanken und Absichten rühren immer noch von der einen Säule her, die alles Heilige umfasst. Ich war einst Mitglied des Adeptus Ministorum. Ich diene dem Gottimperator, den Ihr Omnissiah nennt, und darum gehören wir zur selben Herde."
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Namen, die unsere Gebete krönen, mögen verschieden sein, doch all unsere Gedanken und Absichten rühren immer noch von der einen Säule her, die alles Heilige umfasst. Ich diene dem Gottimperator, den Ihr Omnissiah nennt, und darum gehören wir zur selben Herde."

languages.text: « Bien que nous utilisions des noms différents dans nos prières, toutes nos pensées et nos intentions proviennent d'un seul et même pilier : celui du saint et du sacré. À une époque, j'appartenais à l'Adeptus Ministorum. Je sers l'Empereur-Dieu, celui que vous appelez l'Omnimessie, et nous sommes donc du même troupeau. »
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que nous utilisions des noms différents dans nos prières, toutes nos pensées et nos intentions proviennent d'un seul et même pilier : celui du saint et du sacré. À une époque, j'appartenais à l'Adeptus Ministorum. Je sers l'Empereur-Dieu, celui que vous appelez l'Omnimessie, et nous sommes donc du même troupeau. »

languages.text: “尽管我们在祈祷时会冠以不同的名字，但我们所有的思想与意图仍然源自神圣不可侵犯的唯一支柱。我原本是国教教会的一员，我侍奉的是神皇，而你们称之为‘欧姆尼塞亚’，因此，我们是同一类人。”
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我们在祈祷时会冠以不同的名字，但我们所有的思想与意图仍然源自神圣不可侵犯的唯一支柱。我侍奉的是神皇，而你们称之为‘欧姆尼塞亚’，因此，我们是同一类人。”

languages.text: 「祈りをささげるお方の名は異なるかもしれないが、{mf|俺|私}たちのすべての考えと意志は、神聖なるものの一本の柱に基づいている。{mf|俺|私}はかつて、帝国宗務局に属していた。{mf|俺|私}は神帝陛下、お前たちが『万機神』と呼ぶ方に仕えている。つまり、{mf|俺|私}たちは同じ者を信じる仲間だ」
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: 「祈りをささげるあの方の名は違うかもしれないが、私たちのすべての考えと意志は神聖なるものの一本の柱に基づいている。私は神帝陛下、お前たちが万機神呼ぶ方に仕えている。だから、私たちは同じ仲間だ」

languages.text: «Aunque Sus nombres sean diferentes en nuestras oraciones, todos nuestros pensamientos e intenciones provienen del mismo pilar de todo lo que es santo y sagrado. Formé parte del Adeptus Ministorum. Yo sirvo al Dios Emperador, a quien vosotros llamáis el Omnissiah, de modo que somos del mismo rebaño».
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque Sus nombres sean diferentes en nuestras oraciones, todos nuestros pensamientos e intenciones provienen del mismo pilar de todo lo que es santo y sagrado. Yo sirvo al Dios Emperador, a quien vosotros llamáis el Omnissiah, de modo que somos del mismo rebaño».

languages.text: "Dualarımızda O'nun farklı isimlerini zikretsek de tüm fikir ve niyetlerimiz, mukaddes ve kutsi olan her şeyin yekpare sütunundan doğar. Bir zamanlar ben de Adeptus Ministorum'a mensuptum. Sizin Hermesih dediğiniz Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet ederim. Bundandır ki aynı cemaate mensubuz."
languages.original_text: "Different though His names may be that we use to crown our prayers, all our thoughts and intents still stem from the one pillar of all that is holy and sacred. I was once one of the Adeptus Ministorum. I serve the God-Emperor, whom you call the Omnissiah, and thus we are of the same flock."

traits.locale_text: "Dualarımızda O'nun farklı isimlerini zikretsek de tüm fikir ve niyetlerimiz, mukaddes ve kutsi olan her şeyin yekpare sütunundan doğar. Bir zamanlar ben de Adeptus Minitorum'a mensuptum. Sizin Hermesih dediğiniz Tanrı İmparator'a hizmet ederim. Bundandır ki aynı cemaate mensubuz."
